Clockwork:AdaptiveCannon.NAME: Adaptive Cannon
Clockwork:AdaptiveCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play this card, reduce its cost by !M! for this combat.

Clockwork:AdaptiveShield.NAME: Adaptive Shield
Clockwork:AdaptiveShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you play this card, reduce its cost by !M! for this combat.

Clockwork:AssemblyLine.NAME: Assembly Line
Clockwork:AssemblyLine.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, shuffle !M! Cog into your draw pile.
Clockwork:AssemblyLine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, shuffle !M! Cogs into your draw pile.

Clockwork:ChargingBlade.NAME: Charging Blade
Clockwork:ChargingBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Every time this card is played, increase its damage by !M! for this combat.
Clockwork:ChargingBlade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Every time this card is played, increase its damage by !M! for this combat. NL Rebound.

Clockwork:ChargingShield.NAME: Charging Shield
Clockwork:ChargingShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Every time this card is played, increase its Block by !M! for this combat.
Clockwork:ChargingShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Every time this card is played, increase its Block by !M! for this combat. NL Rebound.

Clockwork:CogBarrier.NAME: Cog Barrier
Clockwork:CogBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add !M! Helical Cog to your hand.

Clockwork:CogShield.NAME: Cog Shield
Clockwork:CogShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle !M! Cog into your draw pile.

Clockwork:CogToss.NAME: Cog Toss
Clockwork:CogToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle !M! Cogs to your draw pile. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Clockwork:CraftCopperScales.NAME: Craft: Copper Scales
Clockwork:CraftCopperScales.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Thorns. NL Acquire Copper Scales. NL Fleeting.

Clockwork:CraftMomentumEngine.NAME: Craft: M. Engine
Clockwork:CraftMomentumEngine.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Momentum. NL Acquire a Momentum Engine. NL Fleeting.

Clockwork:DefectiveCog.NAME: Defective Cog
Clockwork:DefectiveCog.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL When this card is exhausted, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Clockwork:DefectiveCog.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL When this card is exhausted, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Clockwork:Downsize.NAME: Downsize
Clockwork:Downsize.DESCRIPTION: Permanently remove a non-Curse card from your deck. NL Depleting !clock:dep!
Clockwork:Downsize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Give a non-curse card Fleeting. It costs 0. NL Depleting !clock:dep!

Clockwork:Enhance.NAME: Enhance
Clockwork:Enhance.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. Increase its damage and Block by !M! for the rest of combat.

Clockwork:FalseStart.NAME: False Start
Clockwork:FalseStart.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If it is your first turn, gain !M! Stasis.
Clockwork:FalseStart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If it is your first turn, gain !M! Stasis.

Clockwork:ForgeStrike.NAME: Forge Strike
Clockwork:ForgeStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of combat.

Clockwork:Friction.NAME: Friction
Clockwork:Friction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Burn to your discard pile.

Clockwork:GoldenCog.NAME: Golden Cog
Clockwork:GoldenCog.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Cog to your hand. NL Acquire a Golden Cog. NL Fleeting.
Clockwork:GoldenCog.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Cogs to your hand. NL Acquire a Golden Cog. NL Fleeting.

Clockwork:HelicalCog.NAME: Helical Cog
Clockwork:HelicalCog.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Clockwork:HelicalCog.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Clockwork:Improve.NAME: Improve
Clockwork:Improve.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card and Upgrade it for the rest of combat.
Clockwork:Improve.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card and Upgrade it for the rest of combat. NL If it is already upgraded, reduce its cost by !M! for the rest of combat.

Clockwork:KaliMa.NAME: KALI MA
Clockwork:KaliMa.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills a non-minion enemy, Acquire a Beating Heart. NL Exhaust.

Clockwork:Minimalism.NAME: Minimalism
Clockwork:Minimalism.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Clockwork:PerfectedStrike.NAME: Perfected Strike
Clockwork:PerfectedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your cards containing "Strike".

Clockwork:Pluck.NAME: Pluck
Clockwork:Pluck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Cog to your hand. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Clockwork:Pluck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Cogs to your hand. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Clockwork:RampUp.NAME: Ramp Up
Clockwork:RampUp.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity until the end of the turn.

Clockwork:Redundancy.NAME: Redundancy
Clockwork:Redundancy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs [E] less energy for every !M! cards in your deck.

Clockwork:ReserveSystems.NAME: Reserve Systems
Clockwork:ReserveSystems.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a Burn to your hand.
Clockwork:ReserveSystems.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a Burn to your discard pile.

Clockwork:Roundhouse.NAME: Roundhouse
Clockwork:Roundhouse.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! card.
Clockwork:Roundhouse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! cards.

Clockwork:Selectivity.NAME: Selectivity
Clockwork:Selectivity.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Fetch that many cards from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
Clockwork:Selectivity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your hand. Fetch that many cards from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

Clockwork:SnapKeep.NAME: Snap Keep
Clockwork:SnapKeep.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fetch a card from your discard pile.

Clockwork:StasisBreak.NAME: Stasis Break
Clockwork:StasisBreak.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Ignores the effects of Stasis.

Clockwork:Strangle.NAME: Strangle
Clockwork:Strangle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you draw a card this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP.

Clockwork:SpurCog.NAME: Spur Cog
Clockwork:SpurCog.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.
Clockwork:SpurCog.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Clockwork:SystemHardening.NAME: System Hardening
Clockwork:SystemHardening.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card this turn, gain !M! Block.
Clockwork:SystemHardening.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Whenever you draw a card this turn, gain !M! Block.

Clockwork:SystemScan.NAME: System Scan
Clockwork:SystemScan.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card for every !M! cards in your deck. NL Discard 1 card.
Clockwork:SystemScan.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card for every !M! cards in your deck.

Clockwork:TimeWalk.NAME: Time Walk
Clockwork:TimeWalk.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

Clockwork:Tinker.NAME: Tinker
Clockwork:Tinker.DESCRIPTION: Permanently increase the damage and Block of a Clockwork card by !M!. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Clockwork:UnlimitedCogworks.NAME: Unlimited Cogworks
Clockwork:UnlimitedCogworks.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw 7 cards in a turn, add !M! Cog to your hand.
Clockwork:UnlimitedCogworks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw 7 cards in a turn, add !M! Cog to your hand. If you ever have 7 Cogs in your hand, Exhaust them all and deal 50 damage to ALL enemies.

Clockwork:WarmUp.NAME: Warm Up
Clockwork:WarmUp.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Cannot be played after other cards in a turn. NL Gain !M! Stasis. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I have already played a card this turn.

Clockwork:ZeroPointEnergy.NAME: Zero Point Energy
Clockwork:ZeroPointEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Stasis. NL At the start of each turn, if you are in Stasis, gain [E] [E]
Clockwork:ZeroPointEnergy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Stasis. NL At the start of each turn, if you are in Stasis, gain [E] [E] [E]
